descriptionSet.description: This advertisement is divided in two parts: The upper one advertises a Veet hair remover, showing a white, blonde, western woman applying some of the advertised product on her right armpit. A detailed text highlights the strengthes of the product. This section can not be read properly due to unsuffuicient scanning. The lower section hosts an advertisement for foreign stamp packages, depicting one sample with a mother and her child as well as a rough price overview.

inscription.text: To remove Hair Without Razors, Elctri [...] Needles or Smelly Depilatories

Amazing new discovery! A dainty, white fragmant cream. Apply straight from [...] tube. Wash off with plain water Every trace of hair is gone! Skin is left soft and smooth and velvet. No stubble like the razorleaves. No coarse regrowth. Sold everywhere under Trade mark "Veet." Razors only make hair grow faster and courser. The quick, easy and pleasent way to end your superflou [...] hair troubles for ever is with New "Veet". Successful results guaranteed or money refunded. Obtainable at all dealers.
Stamps If you collect stamps, write to our Fortnightly Lists which will be regularely sent to you free of charge.

Note these bargains: All different. Genuine. 500 Whole World Rs. 1 - 4 1000 " " " 3 - 0 3000 " " " 15 - 0 100 British India " 1 - 6 50 Indian States Rs. 0 - 8 100 " " " 1 - 8 400 " " " 17 - 8 600 " " " 40 - 0

Each of these foreign country packets 2 As. 25 Austria, 15 Brazil, 25 Czechoslovakia, 25 Denmark, 10 Morocco, 25 Spain, 25 Poland, 25 Roumania, 25 Switzerland. Order by V.P.P. "Mother & Child" complete sets of Belgium - Rs- 1 -12 Queen Astrif " 1 - 12 other sets in our list. Philatelie Orient Kodak House, Hornby Road, Bombay

Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

A detailed text highlights the strengthes of the product. This section can not be read properly due to unsuffuicient scanning.
